title: S6 E5: Massacre at the Tree of Life Synagogue | JE
description:
Follow JE Reich on Twitter and Instagram

Tree of Life Synagogue 

Inside the Tree of Life Congregation, the Prayer for the Dead Brings Hope by J.E. Reich 

Thank you so much to Crime Junkie for featuring SWW’s Episode Predator (S6 E2) on their episode BWBRSA: Operation Fireball!

Check out Jez' new podcast: Let’s Get Back To Questionable, Inappropriate Advice + More


For more info about SWW and to access free mental health resources, please visit SomethingWasWrong.com

Follow Tiffany Reese on Instagram 

Music from Glad Rags album Wonder Under
